languages.text: "Я всем довол{mf|ен|ьна}. Продолжайте и дальше работать на благо династии".

traits.locale_text: "Я всем довол{mf|ен|ьна}. Продолжайте и дальше работать на благо династии".

languages.text: "I am satisfied with the way things are. Continue your efforts for the good of the dynasty."
languages.original_text: "Я всем довол{mf|ен|ьна}. Продолжайте и дальше работать на благо династии".

traits.locale_text: "I am pleased with you all. Continue your efforts for the good of the dynasty."
"I am pleased with you all. Continue your efforts for the good of the dynasty."
"I am pleased with you all. Continue your efforts for the good of the dynasty."
"I am satisfied with the way things are. Continue your efforts for the good of the dynasty."
"I am satisfied with the way things are. Continue your efforts for the good of the dynasty."

languages.text: 「今の状況には満足している。王朝のために、引き続き尽力してくれ」
languages.original_text: "I am satisfied with the way things are. Continue your efforts for the good of the dynasty."

traits.locale_text: 「今の状況には満足している。王朝のために、引き続き尽力してくれ」

languages.text: "Ben bu durumdan memnunum. Hanedanlığın iyiliği adına sürdürdüğünüz çalışmalara devam edin."
languages.original_text: "I am satisfied with the way things are. Continue your efforts for the good of the dynasty."

traits.locale_text: "Ben bu durumdan memnunum. Hanedanlığın iyiliği adına sürdürdüğünüz çalışmalarınıza devam edin."

languages.text: «No tengo problema con la situación actual. Continúen sus esfuerzos por el bien de la dinastía».
languages.original_text: "I am satisfied with the way things are. Continue your efforts for the good of the dynasty."

traits.locale_text: «No tengo problema con la situación actual. Continúen sus esfuerzos por el bien de la dinastía».

languages.text: “目前的状况我很满意，为了王朝的利益继续努力吧。”
languages.original_text: "I am satisfied with the way things are. Continue your efforts for the good of the dynasty."

traits.locale_text: “目前的状况我很满意，为了王朝的利益继续努力吧。”

languages.text: « Le fonctionnement actuel me convient. Continuez à œuvrer pour le bien de la dynastie. »
languages.original_text: "I am satisfied with the way things are. Continue your efforts for the good of the dynasty."

traits.locale_text: « Le fonctionnement actuel me convient. Continuez à œuvrer pour le bien de la dynastie. »

languages.text: "Ich bin zufrieden, wie die Dinge sind. Setzt Eure Bemühungen zum Wohl der Dynastie fort."
languages.original_text: "I am satisfied with the way things are. Continue your efforts for the good of the dynasty."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin zufrieden, wie die Dinge sind. Setzt Eure Bemühungen zum Wohl der Dynastie fort."
